macro.name: META:TOPICPARENT
macro.description: %META:TOPICPARENT{name="parent_name"}% sets the parent of the current topic. "parent_name" must be a topic of the same cluster.

macro.name: META:TOPICINFO
macro.description: %META:TOPICINFO{author="user_name"}% sets the parent of the current topic. "user_name" must be a valid user name.

macro.name: ATOM:FEED
macro.description: Returns a link to the ATOM based XML document generated for the Changelog of the topic.

macro.name: RSS:FEED
macro.description: Returns a link to the Changelog for the topic.

macro.name: FEED:ATOM
macro.description: Returns a link to the ATOM based XML document generated for the Changelog of the topic.

macro.name: FEED:RSS
macro.description: Returns a link to the Changelog for the topic.

macro.name: CLUSTER:NAME
macro.description: Returns the name of the cluster.

macro.name: CLUSTER:DESCRIPTION
macro.description: Returns the description of the cluster.

macro.name: CLUSTER:OWNER
macro.description: Returns the owner of the cluster.

macro.name: CLUSTER:MEMBERS
macro.description: Returns a list with the members of the cluster.

macro.name: MAIN:ABSTRACT
macro.description: Returns a table with links to the clusters and available operations on them.

macro.name: MAIN:DASHBOARD
macro.description: Returns a table with links to the clusters and available operations on them.

macro.name: MAIN:TABLEOFCLUSTERS
macro.description: Returns a table with links to the clusters and their description.

macro.name: MAIN:TABLEOFUSERS
macro.description: Returns a table with links to the users and their description.

macro.name: SEMANTIC:FACTS
macro.description: Returns a table of the semantic objects (predicate, object, subject).

macro.name: STATISTICS:POPULARTOPICS
macro.description: Returns a table with links to the 10 most popular topics of the current cluster.

macro.name: STATISTICS:TOPAUTHORS
macro.description: Returns a table with links to the 10 most popular authors.

macro.name: TECHNORATI:COSMOS
macro.description: Returns the result from API query to http://api.technorati.com/cosmos.

macro.name: TECHNORATI_TAG
macro.description: Returns the result from API query to http://api.technorati.com/tag.

macro.name: REFBY
macro.description: Returns a list of topics which have a reference to the current topic.

macro.name: CLUSTER
macro.description: Returns the name of the current cluster.

macro.name: TOPIC
macro.description: Returns a link to the current topic.

macro.name: SEARCH
macro.description: Returns a table with name, size, owner and date of topics according to the search criteria.Example: %SEARCH{"search"}%

macro.name: CHANGELOG
macro.description: %CHANGELOG{local="1" rows="10"}% returns the last 10 changes to the current cluster.

macro.name: NOW
macro.description: Returns the time you opened the topic.

macro.name: USERS
macro.description: Returns a list of all wiki users in an alphabetic order.

macro.name: WEB
macro.description: Returns the name of the cluster.

macro.name: USERPROP
macro.description: %USERPROP{"FULLNAME"}% returns the name of the user. %USERPROP{"EMAIL"}% returns the e-mail of the user.

macro.name: TOPPAGES
macro.description: Returns a list of last visited topics in the current cluster.

macro.name: TOC
macro.description: Returns a table of contents for the topic based on headings.

macro.name: UNUSEDPAGES
macro.description: Returns a list of the topics with no references to them.

macro.name: WIKIUSERNAME
macro.description: Returns the wiki name of the user.

macro.name: INCLUDE
macro.description: %INCLUDE{"myWiki.Hello"}% returns the contents of the topic myWiki.Hello.

macro.name: CATEGORIES
macro.description: Returns a list of all Category topics in the current cluster.

macro.name: COMMENTS
macro.description: Returns a form for posting a comment to the owner of the topic.

macro.name: MACROS
macro.description: Returns a list of all wiki macros.

macro.name: INLINE
macro.description: Returns the result of inline defined procedure.
